content:
Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Narriseminek]{Narriseminek}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Nhimbaloth]{Nhimbaloth}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Shyka]{Shyka}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Sivanah]{Sivanah}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.The Lantern King]{The Lantern King}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Tsukiyo]{Tsukiyo}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Zura]{Zura}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Hyperfocus]{Hyperfocus}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ephemeral Hazards]{Ephemeral Hazards}

You can bring about hallucinations and restlessness.
name: Delirium Domain
